results.description:
I am in the process of integrating this group into another group I have created called Pure Energy as I Am now teaching and facilitating group meditations on many different spiritual subjects, not just the Violet Flame.  I encourage you to check out Pure Energy.  I will be facilitating Violet Flame meditations through that group.

This group is for those who are interested in accelerated spiritual advancement and a deeper understanding of how we can release or overcome boundaries we have placed on ourselves.

My guided meditations include the use of intent, crystal bowls, Tibetan bowls and tuning forks to enhance the vibration and depth of the healing work.

My teachings go beyond just the Violet Flame in that I also instruct on different aspects of the energy body, different aspects of ego, different aspects of cause and effect, The I AM Presence, Ascended Masters, Archangels/Angels, Christ Consciousness, 5th Dimensional Chakra system, past life vows, soul contracts, Twin Flames, overcoming limiting beliefs, and many more.

These sessions tend to end with group discussion as participants enjoy being around like minded individuals and sharing their experiences and receiving new ideas.  I create a safe space for this type of interaction as my goal is to bring the spiritual communities together in unity and raise the vibration of those around us and the earth.

A typical Violet Flame session consists of learning about the Violet Flame, its history, the energy body and the important facets that comprise this unique modality, a guided meditation and decreeing.

The Violet Flame has the power to erase, or transmute the cause, effect and memory of our past mistakes. It changes negative energy into positive energy, darkness into light and erases the resultant "bad karma". It is a unique spiritual energy that can help you in all areas of your life. It can heal emotional and physical problems, improve your relationships and finances, help you to grow spiritually, or just make life easier. As my mentor used to say, it "clears the trauma without the drama".  Decrees are spoken prayer and declaration of our intents for healing.  It calls in the power of the Violet Flame.

I'm very open to ideas and molding this group to suit the needs of all it's members. I have a 9 year old daughter and am open to all kinds of people, including those with kids, without kids, with or without partners, and all ages as well. All you need is a LOVE of games. I hope that we will all share in hosting a game night and as our group continues to grow, we will make lots of new friends in the process!!

results.description:
SPiN is a group of parents committed to supporting their gender non-conforming, gender-fluid, and socially transitioned children. As a group, we endeavor to:

  • Love our children for who they are
  • Challenge traditional assumptions about gender
  • Create safe places for our children
  • Prepare our children to deal with bullying

In order to be a member you must be a parent of a gender non-conforming child (3-10 years in age) and have a short interview with one of our parent volunteers.

results.description:
We would like through this meet-up to provide a space where others may come experience and learn more about the Spiritual Heart, Reiki Tummo, and Kundalini. It is open to everyone!!!

All the truth in your heart, not the physical heart, but if the heart within you where lies your true self. To access the truth you must open your heart and Tummo Reiki can help do just that. By learning Reiki Tummo not only introduces you to the channeling of energy for healing, but also learns a tool that guides you to your heart, so you can learn directly from his heart, instead of others. " ~ Irmansyah Effendi. 

 

We help facilitate practices, personalized guidance and workshops of Reiki Tummo and Open Heart Meditation.

What is Reiki Tummo? 
 Tummo Reiki is not only becoming a good healer. By contrast, Reiki Tummo we realize that the True Source, our Divine Source is and always will be the best healer.As you learn to connect with the heart and in harmony with the divine energy, you will have the wonderful opportunity to become an instrument for the blessings of the True Source to work through you. 

What is Open Heart Meditation? 
Open Heart Meditation is different from all the techniques of meditation, because it works with the spiritual heart (the feeling center) to connect to the true source of love and light, so we can drop all kinds of negative emotions , which have caused stress or problems in our spiritual heart. 

Download the Open Heart Meditation™

The Open Heart Meditation is now available for download in MP3 format on iTunes and CD Baby for $2.99. Click here to download from iTunes or CD Baby.


How much you really know about your heart and how to learn to listen to your heart in everyday life.?

 

The spiritual Heart, the key to deep calmness, inner peace, happiness and spiritual growth, is the foundation of Open Heart Meditation and Reiki Tummo. Reiki Tummo offers an energy system that incorporates learning about our spiritual hearts and energy bodies while healing physical, mental, emotional and other non-physical parts of our being. Through a series of gentle steps and courses, Reiki Tummo prepares the foundations to support your continuing spiritual growth and development.

So come along and be prepared to smile, relax, and experience the sweet feelings of Love radiating from within your Heart :-) For more information about Reiki Tummo please visit: www. padmacahaya.com - For more information about Open Heart please visit: www.heartsanctuary.org and www.open-your-heart.org.uk

We also host another Reiki Tummo & Open Heart group in Bethesda & Potomac MD area:  http://www.meetup.com/reikitummo-openheart/

Reiki Tummo Workshops  please email reiktummo.dc at gmail.com or visit www.reikitummodc.com

We are now hosting Meetups in Bethesda, Columbia, Townson & Baltimore areas.

results.description:
GO to the Dog Park!

 

GO to the Dog Park! is a new group launched by Columbia Dogs on the Go on a trial basis. With several dog parks in the area—and two more planned for Columbia—there will be plenty of opportunities for play!

GO to the Dog Park! allows you to use Meetup's networking tools to connect with others at dog parks. It is a member-led group. Any member can set up a dog park “Meetup.” The Organizer's role is to facilitate and moderate postings, and not to organize Meetups. This group will be only as active as its members make it!

To participate, you must read and follow the instructions on "Set up a dog park play date!" in the Discussion section.

Let's try this out for a few months! If there is little activity or if unanticipated problems arise, we will close it.

Our 1000-member Columbia Dogs on the Go Meetup, now 5 years old, continues to organize leashed group walks and other activities. Its website, www.cdogsgo.com, has even more ideas for having fun with your dog: dog-friendly places to eat, a calendar of dog events, great places to walk, and more.

Note: If you are a current member of Columbia Dogs on the Go, you will not be automatically enrolled in this new Meetup group. You must join this one too if you want to participate!
results.name: GO to the Dog Park!

results.description: How do you measure success?  The amount of money you make?  How far you’ve advanced in your chosen field? The number of awards and credentials you’ve earned?  Certainly, these are all achievements that we as professionals and entrepreneurs should be proud of, but what is equally (if not more) important is that we stay grounded, maintain work-life balance, and use our successes to help others and our communities.  If you agree, then this group is for you! Let’s get together to share our experiences, to network, to support one another and to take ourselves and those around us to the Next Level!

results.description: Eight Year ago, I noticed my mother had changed emotionally and physically. I was not sure why but observe she needed additional care - that began my journey as the primary caregiver of my now 86 year old mother with Parkinson and Memory challenges. Had I known of a network of other CGers - I believe I could have accomplished so much more for her. So, out of a need to have us all share and part take of "CGers" best practices - this meetup was formed. Taken from the phase - I am having a senior moment - I came up with - I am having a CareGivers Moment. Join, Share, Heal and most importantly provide the best quality of life to the person your are caregiving.

results.description:
Living in or around the metro "greenline" from Greenbelt to Hyattsville, and looking for a way to make some friends and explore all that this great city of DC has to offer?  Then you've come to the right place!  This group is for active, social adults, in the age range of 30ish to 40ish, living along the metro "greenline" including Greenbelt, College Park, Riverdale, and Hyattsville.  We seek to connect with like-minded adults for dinners, drinks, movies, arts/culture, sports, trips into DC or even Baltimore- you name it.  Singles and couples all welcome!

We are looking for active, friendly, RESPECTFUL people to join us for fun.  No drama please!

Please note:  Our age range is a guideline, not a strict requirement.  Our members will most likely be in the 30 to 50 range, but if you are outside of that range and are fun, friendly, and respectful, you are welcome to join us.

results.description:
Free Spirits is a diverse group of like minded individuals that are curious and/or actively living an alternative lifestyle. We encourage people of various backgrounds to come out and participate in sharing thoughts and experiences, as well as learn from one another.

We provide a safe and comfortable environment (judgment free zone) including discussions, game nights and social get-togethers on a regular basis. Our goal is to be as culturally diverse as the community we live in.

WE WANT ACTIVE MEMBERS!

What that means is, if you have not shown up for at least one event out of a two month time period since the time you joined, you will be deleted.

This is in no way just a sexually based group.  We are an ACTIVE sex positive, gender positive, and body positive group.

This group is geared towards people who are open or interested in learning or who are involved in an open relationship, polyamory, BDSM, or other alternative lifestyles.

Although we welcome anyone to join, we are currently accepting single males on a SELECTIVE basis due to our current revamping and group balance.
results.name: Free Spirits

results.description: The original name was going to be "The messy writer's group for the functionally nutty," but we don't all have to be messy, or nutty, or functional. We read, write and perform poetry. Sometimes it shoots, sometimes sits like dirt, sometimes resists like phlegm, or oozes, or sometimes it just rests above our heads- no matter. It's a product of "the great yellow rose in your brain" (that's Ginsberg). If you have ever said to yourself, after writing a whole bunch of words on a page, "Man I wish I could read this to someone besides my evil twin..." we want to hear them.
results.name: The Great Yellow Rose in your Brain- Baltimore Poetry Group

results.description:
Welcome eBay and Amazon online sellers – Join to Learn about Selling Online, Growing Your Business and Succeeding Online. Network with like-minded entrepreneurs who are reinventing themselves or have left the 9-to-5 behind or maybe like in my case the 9-to-5 laid me off. What is your Plan B? Join us to reinvent yourself and become your own boss, start working on your Plan B or to network with other online sellers.

My name is Imogene Armstrong and I was an IT professional for over 30 years. I worked 23 years at my last job before I was laid-off in 2009. I am glad I had a Plan B; I have been selling on eBay since 1999. I am a Top Rated Seller, Powerseller and an eBay Education Specialist trained by eBay. I also have been selling on Amazon since 2007.

If you are interested in learning how to sell on eBay, please check the eBay Education Specialist website for my class dates and times, or email me to schedule a class. I teach mostly one-on-one with an occasional group class. The class includes everything you need to know to begin selling successfully on eBay. I also do a “Shop with Jean” workshop where we spend time at a thrift store or estate sale and I show you what sells well on eBay or Amazon. I go over my thrifting routine and the tools I use when thrift shopping. We’ll spend 1-2 hours at the thrift store/estate sale and then go to a coffee shop to discuss the items purchased and other hot items to look for. I can show you how to turn $20 into $100 and sometimes more. There is no guarantee but, I do it over and over again. My last 6 items on eBay sold for over $140, and I paid approximately $12.75. It does not take a lot of money to start an eBay business.
results.name: DC Metro Area eBay & Amazon Sellers Group

results.description: This Meetup group is about solving genealogy research problems. We help our members break through their "brick walls." We share tips, strategies, and resources. Together, we brainstorm ideas to help our members learn about their family's past. Our conversations are held in College Park, Maryland, in an informal, relaxed setting, on Saturday mornings/afternoons. Novices, practiced genealogists, and “the curious” are all welcome. The organizer has over 35 years experience researching his family history.

results.description:
Consider becoming an OWASP member today. Your membership fee and voluntary donations help us keep the chapter running.

What is OWASP
The Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) is an open-source application security project led by The OWASP Foundation, a professional association of global members that is open to anyone interested in learning more about software security. The OWASP community works to create freely-available articles, methodologies, documentation, tools, and technologies.

Who can attend?
There is no bar for entry. Whether you are interested in security, would like to hear from professionals in the industry, simply network with other professionals in the Baltimore metro area, or discuss application security and related security topics, feel free to drop by at our monthly chapter meetings. To be a SPEAKER at the Baltimore OWASP Chapter, contact Michael Hixon or any of  the chapter leaders with details of what OWASP project, independent research or related software security topic you would like to present on. Welcome once again. We hope to see you around.

 

FOLLOW US

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/BaltimoreOWASP
LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/groups/OWASP-Baltimore-Chapter-4879966
Official: https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Baltimore
results.name: OWASP Baltimore Chapter

results.description: This group is for anyone who has been diagnosed with Gastroparesis, is in the process of being diagnosed, or has digestive issues that the medical community cannot figure out. I started this group to meet more people who have Gastroparesis, or unexplained digestive issues, to have the opportunity to discuss what we are going through and support one another through good and bad days. I am starting support groups in other areas as well, so that there are a few places to choose from. While Bill HR2239 did not get voted on Nov, 2012, we will continue to find every way possible to get set in place the important protocols. Lets get support going for so many who are living with digestive issues that are not explained or misdiagnosed, which may be symptoms of Gastroparesis. Digestive pain, GERD/Reflux, problems swallowing, feeling full early and pain associated with eating food, diarrhea, constipation, and many more symptoms. Feel free to attend, even if you are not sure if this sounds like you. The more information you know, the better prepared you are when seeing physicians, or when seeking medical support.
results.name: Gastroparesis, digestive illness, Support Group

results.description: This group is for the mature caribbean expat woman who is looking to enjoy some fun activities such as parties, dining out, movies, plays, bowling, night outs, and more in our local area. This group was formed because there are a lot of older caribbean  women who might not be able to make the connections to others even though we're living in the same area. This group is to find some hopefully lasting friendships or just to hang out with some  friends of similar culture. You are also welcome to make suggestions if you have any ideas for a meetup. There is a once a year membership due of $5.00. Please make your payment as soon as you've joined. Remember to RSVP for any meetups you wish to attend and please rate the meetups that you've been to. I will always give out my cell phone number in private so you can contact me when we're meeting up. You can make your payment online through Amazon or pay by cash or check to me. Just let me know. Please when you set your profile please have a photo of you that clearly shows your face - no masks or cartoon or other art work as the rest of us need this so that we can know who we are meeting up with. If this sounds like the group for you then please join us.
results.name: Caribbean Divas (40's,50's +) Singles Group in Silver Spring
